article: The Florida sun baked my shoulders as I worked along the 1-595 freeway near Fort Lauderdale, picking up rubbish. I paused to _ the sweat off my forehead and look up at the cloudless blue sky. " why " can't it rain?" I thought. That would _ things off. I thought about my _ , who were _ sitting in an air-conditioned classroom at the high school right now. I'd had some _ in school, so my parents decided to let met work full-time with my dad. We both worked for my uncle, who had taken _ of a road maintenance company. It was up to us to keep the roads _ of rubbish. The job was _ and dirty, especially on hot days like this. I _ why I ever agreed to do it. We continued our _ route along 595, _ for the overpass bridge. Then I noticed an area where some _ were broken on the ground. They weren't like that before. ' Dad! Pull over! I want to _ something out." I jumped off the truck and rushed to the bridge. Something was telling me to _ ... there wasn't much time. _ I saw a Toyota that _ upside down in the trees. Maybe it was a stolen car that somebody _ there. Then I noticed something _ . It was a bloody leg poking out of the driver's side window. " Heeeelp" a lady moaned.
